events.content: Plan a 3-day itinerary for Kyoto with highlights and coffee.

Basically I have a week off from Nov 1 - Nov 8. I’ve never been to Japan before, but I’ve always dreamed of visiting. I want a cultural experience I won’t forget. I’m on a modest budget though. Can you help me find a good place to stay?
Budget is $300/night, looking for a room with a king sized bed for my partner and I. Old town atmosphere.
Arriving evening of Nov 3, leaving Nov 7 in the morning. I’d prefer boutique hotels.
I agree with your top 2 choices. I will book separately. Do you have any other helpful tips for the trip?
